name: Lucky Roll
description: Next dice roll is maximum.

name: Double Rent
description: Next rent you collect is doubled.

name: Tax Refund
description: Refunds any tax paid this turn.

name: Property Freeze
description: Prevent another player from buying/selling property this turn.

name: Steal Cash
description: Take a small fixed amount from a random opponent.

name: Move Backwards
description: Move another player backward a few spaces.

name: Extra Roll
description: Roll the dice again immediately.

name: Safe Haven
description: Skip penalties like Chance or Community Chest cards this turn.

name: Bank Loan
description: Receive extra in-game tokens immediately.

name: Property Swap
description: Swap ownership of a property with another player.

name: Rent Discount
description: Reduce rent payment by 50% next turn.

name: Free Property
description: Claim any unowned property instantly.

name: Time Warp
description: Skip another playerâ€™s turn.

name: Dice Predictor
description: Know your next dice roll in advance.

name: Jail Escape Kit
description: Leave jail without paying or waiting.

name: Trade Boost
description: Boost negotiation power in trades.

name: Loan Forgiveness
description: Cancel debt or penalty owed in game.

name: Chance Multiplier
description: Double the reward from a Chance card.

name: Community Chest Shield
description: Block negative Community Chest effects.

name: Custom Token Skin
description: Change your player token appearance.

name: Board Theme
description: Change board visual theme (e.g., neon, medieval).

name: Special House/Hotel
description: Unique designs for houses and hotels.

name: Username Badge
description: Display special badge on leaderboard or lobby.

name: VIP Icon
description: Shiny icon next to your avatar.

name: Animated Token
description: Player token has a subtle animation.

name: Property Glow
description: Owned properties have a glowing effect.

name: Background Music Pack
description: Unlock a new music theme in the game.

name: Custom Dice Skin
description: Unique dice design when rolling.

name: Celebration Animation
description: Animated fireworks or effects when winning a game.

name: Extra Stash
description: Store additional tokens beyond starting cash.

name: Lucky Charm
description: Slightly increases chances for high rolls.

name: Golden Ticket
description: Automatic win for one property auction.

name: Speed Boost
description: Move extra spaces once per game.

name: Magic Trade
description: Force trade favorable to you once.

name: Invisible Token
description: Your token hides from other players for 1 turn.

name: Teleport
description: Move to any space on the board once.

name: Power-Up Card
description: Random bonus effect on use.

name: Bonus Collectible
description: Gain extra tokens when passing Go.

name: Reward Multiplier
description: Double the token gain from in-game purchases once.
